input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Lists all the available roles in the server. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>find-role-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <role> <all/> </role> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. role[Required] Indicates that role details are required. all[Required] Indicates that all role details are required.
2. Provides information about the role specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>find-role-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <role> <role-id>1001</role-id> </role> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. role[Required] Indicates that role details are required. role-id[Required] id of the role whose details are required.
3. Provides a detailed description of all the available roles in the server. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>find-role-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <role> <all/> </role> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. role[Required] Indicates that role details are required. all[Required] Indicates that all role details are required.
4. Provides a detailed description about the role specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>find-role-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <role> <role-id>1001</role-id> </role> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. role[Required] Indicates that role details are required. role-id[Required] id of the role whose details are required.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Lists all the available roles in the server. 2. Provides information about the role specified. 3. Provides a detailed description of the available roles on the server. 4. Provides a detailed description of the role specified.
